'''Beta 1.7.0.9''' is the fifth and final beta version released for [[Bedrock Edition 1.7.0]], released on September 24, 2018,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360016292391-Minecraft-Beta-1-7-0-9-Xbox-One-Windows-10-Android-|title=Minecraft Beta - 1.7.0.9 (Xbox One/Windows 10/Android)}}</ref> which fixed bugs.

== Fixes ==
*  Fixed several crashes that occurred during gameplay.
*  Fixed a crash that could occur when applying a [[resource pack]].
*  Fixed a crash for connected [[player]]s riding a [[pig]] in [[multiplayer]].
*  Fixed player permission issues that prevented players from [[building]] or [[mining]].
*  Fixed a bug where many [[mob]]s would have broken models in some marketplace worlds.</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* The release date of this beta coincides with the day that [[Apple TV Edition]] has been discontinued.
